snippet: Despite winning two Olympic gold medals and a Stanley Cup, the demonstrative and outspoken Drew Doughty is not always recognized as one of the N.H.L.’s best defensemen.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings defenseman Drew Doughty, winner of two Olympic gold medals and a Stanley Cup, is not always recognized for his substantial contributions to the team; Doughty, who leads all defensemen in points in the playoffs, and has played more minutes than any other player, is preparing for Game 2 of Stanley Cup finals against New York Rangers.
lead_paragraph: Despite winning two Olympic gold medals and a Stanley Cup, the demonstrative and outspoken Drew Doughty is not always recognized as one of the N.H.L.’s best defensemen.

headline.main: With a Flair for the Dramatic, Doughty Fuels the Stoic Kings
headline.print_headline: With a Flair for the Dramatic, Doughty Fuels the Stoic Kings
